short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minimal extension that allows you to share embedded 'vx' versions of tiktoks directly from your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whether on your "For You" page, or focusing on a tiktok, the "Copy Link" button has been replaced with "Copy Embed." Now when you click that button, you get a redirect URL to vxtiktok. This helps with sending links to TikTok on platforms such as Discord.

TikTok logo owned by ByteDance.
Link Art by Vecteezy.
